person.persName: John M. Ferguson (Covington, Kentucky, real estate agent)

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, real estate agent. Ohio native. Married to Elenor J. Thomas Ferguson in Kenton County on February 14, 1856. Father of William Ferguson and Charles Ferguson. Real estate agent in Covington in 1860.
